edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.PlanningPoker.views

Class MainView

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.PlanningPoker.views.MainView

  • public class MainView
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class encapsulating the GUI for the two parts of the planning poker UI: - The component in the Janeway module toolbar area. - The component in the main dislpay area of the Janeway module. This class is implemented as a singleton because there should only ever be one instance of each of the main UI components.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Austin Rose (atrose)

        private static MainView singleInstance

      • cardToolbarComponent

        private javax.swing.JComponent cardToolbarComponent
        The component filling the toolbar area of the planning poker module. It's a JPanel with a card layout where the two possible cards are the "toolbar" for the contact prompt view, and the toolbar for the main view.

      • cardMainAreaComponent

        private javax.swing.JComponent cardMainAreaComponent
        The component filling the main area of the planning poker module. It's a JPanel with a card layout where the two possible cards are the main area component for the contact prompt view, and the the main area component for the main view.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainView

        private MainView()
        Constructor initializes all GUI components and starts the UI on the contact information prompt. It is a private member so that this class can be implemented as a singleton.

    • Method Detail

      • addCloseableTab

        public void addCloseableTab(java.lang.String tabName,
                   javax.swing.JPanel tabPanel)
        This function adds a new closeable tab to the planning poker module's inner tab pane.
        Parameters:
        tabName - The title for the tab being added.
        tabPanel - The JPanel to display as the newly added tab's content.

      • removeClosableTab

        public void removeClosableTab()
        This function closes the tab which is currently open in the planning poker module's inner tab pane. TODO: Is there any risk of this closing the should-always-be-open overview tab?

      • refreshGameTree

        public int refreshGameTree()
        This method brings the game-displaying tree in the main overview tab up to date with the database.

      • getToolbarComponent

        public javax.swing.JComponent getToolbarComponent()
        Returns:
        The component that should be displayed in the toolbar area of planning poker. This will either be a banner for the contact prompt, or the main toolbar for planning poker.

      • getMainComponent

        public javax.swing.JComponent getMainComponent()
        Returns:
        The component that should be displayed in the main area of planning poker. This will either be the form/info for the contact information prompt, or the main tabbed pane for planning poker.

      • gameWasDoubleClicked

        private static void gameWasDoubleClicked(PlanningPokerGame selectedGame)
        This function is called with the appropriate argument whenever the user double clicks a game in the tree.
        Parameters:
        selectedGame - The planning poker game which the user has just double clicked in the main view's game tree.

      • createGameButtonClicked

        public static void createGameButtonClicked()
        This method is called whenever the user clicks the "Create New Game" button, and opens up a new closeable tab with the UI for creating a new game.
